name: Bunker of shadows
description:
Warning - Game includes themes of death, madness and suicide

Created in 102 Hours for Senscape's Cursed Adventurous Jam 2022

Bunker of shadows is a first person survival horror game in which the player descends into an abandoned bunker to loot it.

Set 10 years after The Event, mankind is but a husk of its former self, With most of the human population dead, all those remaining can do is survive another night.

With resources running low your camp has tasked you with entering Deep eye, a research and military bunker held by the U.S government until its collapse.

The bunker will be filled with useful items to collect, but without power and bathed in complete darkness the bunker has become infested with the shadows that appeared 10 years ago.

  • Explore the bunker
  • Loot from containers
  • Talk to your friend on the radio
  • Read documents from those who once lived in the bunker
  • Hide from the shadows
  • Loot fast and get a high score

Bunker of shadows is inspired by Metro 2033, Fallout 4, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. and Afraid of monsters.
